function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Worsening of air quality and increase in airborne allergens leading to allergic diseases like asthma and rhino-conjunctivitis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urbanization leading to limited understanding of urban health and disparities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Creation of urban heat islands uhis due to greenhouse gas production and urbanization","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local-scale variation in uhi intensity due to urban geometry","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to higher environmental challenges for human health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in global average temperature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of impacts of climate change","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impacts of climate change on human health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation of health care personnel hcp to new aiirs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure differentials not maintained in aiirs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate negative pressure in patient rooms and anterooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious particles from isolation rooms into the corridor due to lack of anterooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective design and construction of anterooms leading to difficulty in using ppe and disinfecting medical devices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate size of anterooms leading to insufficient space for health care workers to operate","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate number of aiirs airborne infection isolation rooms for severely affected covid-19 patients","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate room size and equipment for critical covid-19 patients requiring extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, mechanical ventilation, or continuous renal replacement therapy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources including medical personnel, medicine, and equipment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of airborne-infection isolation rooms aiirs for covid-19 patients","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for rapid expansion of aiir capacity to prevent infection spread to medical personnel and other patients","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on post-evaluation of known outbreak cases for understanding virus transmission risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of complex human-building interactions and their impact on virus transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of viruses due to human interaction and movement","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and visualization of virus contamination in the built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal overview in 3d situated visualization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex simulation parameters overwhelming non-expert users","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in intuitive comparison of multiple simulation outputs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in neighbor and outdoor noise patterns during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher percentage of responses hearing neighbor noise in flats","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragile health security capacities leading to ineffective handling of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of public health challenges in developing countries due to inward focus of developed economies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in the implementation of the sustainable development goals sdgs due to socio-economic pressures and set-backs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven responses and equivocal commitments to change","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the virus due to resistance to shut down economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Division between cautious and aggressive approaches to economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to taking action against climate change","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shutdown of economies leading to reduction in co2 emissions but rise in waste","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fractured state of global health diplomacy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential reduction in political support for aid and development priorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global coordination and collaboration","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fueling populism and nationalism via patriotism","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-lasting economic impacts on developing nations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fueling of populism and nationalism","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to clean water and proper sanitation leading to increased risk of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to mobile and smart phones, particularly in lower-and middle-income populations and certain regions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to distance learning due to limited internet and technology in developing countries","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
